backend/main.mo: Main marketplace canister defining user profiles, products, categories, carts, and orders with authorization checks and admin‑gated product management APIs.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module exposing a no‑op run function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and tests involved in admin bootstrap and auth refresh features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining the warm color palette for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router configuration with theme provider and global toaster, defining all app routes including admin.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Help card explaining how to use the admin product management interface.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Auth control component handling sign‑in/out, account menu, and navigation to admin or become‑admin actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that blocks access to protected content and shows a sign‑in prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/cart/MobileCartS: Mobile‑only floating cart button showing item count and linking to the cart page.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the root layout with header, footer, routed content, profile setup dialog, and mobile cart shortcut.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders a footer with the current year and a link attribution including app-specific tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderBar: Displays the main navigation bar with logo, links, cart icon with count, and auth controls; shows admin link when applicable.
frontend/src/components/marketplace/Cate: Fetches and displays category buttons with loading and error states, allowing category selection.
frontend/src/components/marketplace/Prod: Shows a product preview card with image, price, mock discount, and link to the product page.
Renders a responsive grid of products with loading, empty, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides cart items merged with product data plus subtotal, and mutation hooks for add, update, and remove.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns identity, profile, and admin status by querying the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, managing authentication, stored identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains data-fetching and mutation hooks for products, categories, orders, checkout, and user profile using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global border and background/foreground styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSellerPage.tsx: Provides an admin-only interface for managing products with add, edit, delete, and admin bootstrapping functionality.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and checkout handling.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows a confirmation message for a placed order and provides navigation to orders or the storefront.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists a user's past orders with status badges, loading states, and authentication protection.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product info with dynamic discount, quantity selection, and add‑to‑cart support.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Shows the main storefront with product search, category filtering, hero section, and product grid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins such as typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current build plan, features, issues, and architectural notes for a Meesho‑like marketplace.
